name: Adam Parks: A Fallen Legacy
description:
Adam Parks still in a Fallen State must encounter any Negativity around his Life. Very little Hope is granted to him and he must do all he can to Help his Friends.

Controls for Keyboard / Mouse /  Mobile

Movement:Arrow KeysLeft ClickTapSprint:Hold Shift + Arrow KeysInteract:Z Button Left ClickTapMenu/Cancel:X ButtonRight ClickTap Twice at the Same TimeFor Offline Play here's the Download Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1G4AHaA-0O9ZbHI8bqjfqifth4bVRq2Em/view?usp=shari...
